channel.title: Please help m with my wildy problem

item.title: Please help m with my wildy problem
item.dc:creator: @eDIT1 -eDIT-
item.description:
@eDIT1 wrote:

can someone make this so that i can have no wild any where but edge 1v1 and multi varrok or just no wildy anywhere at all? look below this is night fusion dspk/pi also it has ep so i am guessing there is pvp involved?

public boolean inWild() {

	if(absX > 1339 && absX < 1338 && absY > 1337 && absY < 1336 
		){ 	
		return true;
	}
	return true;
}


public boolean isInRs() {
	if(absX > 0 && absX < 0 && absY > 0 && absY < 0) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean isInArd() {
	if(absX > 2583 && absX < 2729 && absY > 3255 && absY < 3343) {
//if(absX > 2583 && absX < 2729 && absY > 3255 && absY < 3343)
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean isInYani() {
	if(absX > 2527 && absX < 2634 && absY > 3066 && absY < 3115) {				return true;
	}
	return false;
}
public boolean isInPbox() {
	if(absX > 0 && absX < 0 && absY > 0 && absY < 0) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}
public boolean isInGiantmole() {
	if(absX > 0 && absX < 0 && absY > 0 && absY < 0) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}
public boolean isInKq() {
	if(absX > 0 && absX < 0 && absY > 0 && absY < 0) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}
public boolean isInEdge() {
	if(absX > 3084 && absX < 3111 && absY > 3483 && absY < 3509) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}



public boolean safeZone() {
	if(isInVarBankW() || isInEdgBank() || isInVarBankE()) {
	return true;
	}
	if(absX > 3248 && absX < 3254 && absY > 3430 && absY < 3440
	|| absX > 3255 && absX < 3254 && absY > 3430 && absY < 3438
	|| absX > 3254 && absX < 3258 && absY > 3431 && absY < 3435
	|| absX > 3254 && absX < 3261 && absY > 3434 && absY < 3438
	|| absX > 3248 && absX < 3254 && absY > 3430 && absY < 3438
	|| absX > 3248 && absX < 3258 && absY > 3430 && absY < 3434
	|| absX > 3248 && absX < 3255 && absY > 3430 && absY < 3439)  {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean isInVarBankW() {
	if(absX > 3249 && absX < 3258 && absY > 3415 && absY < 3425) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean isInEdgBank() {
	if(absX > 3090 && absX < 3099 && absY > 3487 && absY < 3500) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean isInVarBankE() {
	if(absX > 3179 && absX < 3191 && absY > 3432 && absY < 3448) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean isAtHome() {
	if(absX > 3260 && absX < 3248 && absY > 3430 && absY < 3439) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean arenas() {
	if(absX > 3331 && absX < 3391 && absY > 3242 && absY < 3260) {	
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean inDuelArena() {
	if((absX > 3322 && absX < 3394 && absY > 3195 && absY < 3291) ||
	(absX > 3311 && absX < 3323 && absY > 3223 && absY < 3248)) {
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean inMulti() {
if(isInArd()) {
return true;
}
if((absX > 0 && absX < 0 && absY > 0 && absY < 0)) {
return true;
}
return false;
